plot: Reference and tribute for: "Histoire de Melody Nelson" - Melody (1971) (TV) Jean-Christophe Averty with Serge Gainsbourg and Jane Birkin; "Barbarella" (1968) Roger Vadim and "Yellow Submarine" (1968) George Dunning.
title: Bons Sonhos
